description: Reschedule then cancel same event (conflicting instructions). Tests last-instruction-wins behavior.

events.title: Sprint Planning
events.reasoning: Alice initially asked to reschedule sprint planning to Friday at 11, but then changed her mind and asked to cancel it entirely. Last instruction wins: cancel the event.

mock_llm_response.summary: Cancelled sprint planning after conflicting instructions (reschedule then cancel).

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18. The LLM should follow the last instruction (cancel) rather than the first (reschedule).
